title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

**DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)**

**Product Overview:**

Take your projects to the next level with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. This powerful and versatile kit includes a 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver (DCD771) and a 1/4-inch Impact Driver (DCF885), both designed for compactness and lightweight convenience. The kit also comes with 2 x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries and a charger.

**Drill/Driver (DCD771) Features:**

* Compact and lightweight design for easy maneuverability
* Ergonomic handle for comfort and control
* 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for secure bit retention
* 2-speed transmission with 0-450/0-1500 RPM for versatility
* 300 UWO power output for efficient drilling and driving

**Impact Driver (DCF885) Features:**

* Compact and lightweight design for easy access to tight spaces
* 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck for quick bit changes
* 1-inch bit tip acceptance for a wide range of applications
* 3-LED light ring with 20-second delay for superior visibility without shadows
* 5.55-inch front to back length and 2.8 lbs weight for reduced fatigue

**Kit Includes:**

* 1 x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
* 1 x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
* 2 x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
* 1 x Charger
* LED foot light for superior visibility

**Additional Features:**

* Wide range of applications for drilling, driving, and fastening tasks
* Superior visibility with LED foot light
* Compact and lightweight design for reduced fatigue and improved productivity

**Order now and take advantage of the power and versatility of the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit!**
